name: Mind of the Broken
description:
Everyone has a rough time trying to let go of people or trying to be okay with certain situations out of their control.

It always has a lasting effect, which is why it's important to deal with it. This Twine piece is meant to show how a person's thoughts in such a situation would be and how they could go about dealing with it. 

This is a twine piece I've been working on and trying to improve over time. 

I started this 2020 and I have changed it drastically to have a better narrative experience.

I hope you enjoy it!
